**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 56 **Complexity** Simple Spirits of long-dead soldiers appear in the mist and attack intruders. --- **Stealth** DC 45 (master) **Disable** DC 45 [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) (legendary) to scare off the soldiers or DC 46 [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) (legendary) to order the soldiers to stand down **Battle** ([attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) **Trigger** A creature enters the area; **Effect** Spirit soldiers lunge out of the mist and attack intruders. The spirit soldiers attempt a spear Strike against each creature within 30 feet.
**Melee** spear +38, **Damage** 6d12+41 piercing --- **Reset** 1 hour.
name: Phantom Soldiers
